title: Burnt Fuselage Recipe

Ingredients

ounce

ounce

1
ounce

Directions
Combine ingredients in a bar glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 to 30 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of orange peel.
